name: minimo
description: An elegant, minimal new tab page
author: krismuniz

scripts.build-firefox: cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && web-ext build --overwrite-dest --artifacts-dir=build && rm -f manifest.json
scripts.build-chrome: cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && mkdir -p build && zip -r ./build/chrome-build.zip ./ -x "*.git*" "*design*" "*docs*" "*design*" "*web-ext-artifacts*" "*manifest.*.json" && rm -f manifest.json
